name: Canyon of the Ancients National Monument
description:
Introduction

Ancient ruins of the Ancestral Puebloans, incl. the Great Kiva, Cutthroat Castle, Painted Hand, and many others found in situ in the desert landscape. An unbelievable opportunity to go into these ruins that are unprotected. Be sure to visit Hovenweep NM when in the area.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media
